1. "One" - This entity represents a single unit of a Global Depository Receipt.
2. "10" - This entity represents the number of common shares that one Global Depository Receipt represents.

These entities are presented in the table above, with the "Person" column containing the numerical entities that could be considered relevant to the context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

The only remaining entity that clearly refers to a person is "10", which represents the number of common shares that one Global Depository Receipt represents.
